node.excerpt: We're now in a new decade and while I'm not too big on writing a personal retrospective, I thought it might be nice to write something on the topic of retrospective itself. As fortune would have it, NHK just streamed Perfume's Reframe 2019 three days…

I couldn't exactly put a finger when, but at one point while preparing myself for AI-related jobseeking, "let's put my resume online in a simple throwaway website," turned into "let's make a personal website with blog from scratch". I do remember…
